title: High School Disaster Management Training Program: Utilizing Drones and Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic disaster management concepts and understanding of scientific technologies
context.additional_context: Practice-centered educational environment based on disaster-affected area case studies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and optimize evacuation routes using drones in a simulated environment
Through gamification activities, individuals can clearly explain their roles and responsibilities during disasters
By researching past disaster cases, community risk factors can be identified and response strategies developed
VR-based training enables recognition of problem situations at disaster sites and decision-making on appropriate actions
Team-based activities foster understanding and implementation of collaboration's importance in disaster management
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
